sense.def:
Z besedo
but
napovemo nekaj, kar je v nasprotju s pravkar povedanim.

seg.quote: It was a long walk but it was worth it.
We'll have a meeting. But not today.
...a cheap but incredibly effective carpet cleaner.

sense.def:
Besedo
but
uporabimo tudi tedaj, ko nekaj dodamo ali spremenimo témo pogovora.

seg.quote: Later I'll be discussing this with Dr Peter Unsworth. But first let me remind you of some of the issues.

sense.def:
Besedo
but
uporabimo tudi tedaj, ko povežemo izgovor ali opravičilo s tistim, kar nameravamo povedati.

seg.quote: I'm sorry, but she's not in at the moment.
Forgive my ignorance, but just what is Arista?

sense.def:
But
ima enak pomen kot
except
.

seg.quote: It could do everything but stop.

sense.def:
V knjižni angleščini lahko
but
pomeni tudi
only
.

seg.quote: Low cost and high speed are but two of the advantages of electronic data handling.

sense.def:
Izraz
but then
uporabimo pred opombo, ki je v rahlem nasprotju s pravkar povedanim.

seg.quote: Iron would do the job better. But then you can't bend iron so easily.

sense.def:
Izraz
but then
lahko uporabimo, preden povemo, da tisto, kar smo pravkar povedali, ni presenetljivo.

seg.quote: They're very close. But then, they've known each other for years and years.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
but for
napovemo edino dejstvo, ki je krivo, da se nekaj določenega ne zgodi ali ni popolnoma res.

seg.quote: But for his ice-blue eyes, he looked like a bearded, wiry Moor.
